author: baxeico
message:
Some notes about updating from 0.9 to 0.10:

I used Yokadi 0.9 before, and to use 0.10 (installed from tar.gz source package) I had to do these steps on Kubuntu 9.04:

- install dateutils module (sudo easy_install dateutils)
- install sqlite3 package (sudo aptitude install sqlite3)
- install Yokadi 0.10 (sudo python ./path_to_yokadi0.10_dir/setup.py install)
- Update database by running: /usr/local/share/yokadi/update/update.py ~/.yokadi.db ~/tmp.db; cp ~/tmp.db ~/.yokadi.db

Hope this helps someone.
